name: Debris (itch) (landsknecht)
description:
Submission for GMTK jam 2020.

Unknown ship lost control and nearly smashed into your space station. Use ship debris to rescue eight escape pods with crewmembers.

LMB - select engine or oxygen tank.
Space - activate/deactivate engine, explode oxygen tank.
R - restart level.

Art by Hyptosis https://opengameart.org/content/space-scifi-rpg-tiles-48x48
Background by Westbeam https://opengameart.org/content/space-background-1
Font by MNDV.ecb https://opengameart.org/content/ogafgjf1-ttf-font
SFX by rubberduck https://opengameart.org/content/50-cc0-sci-fi-sfx
Intro by brandon75689 https://opengameart.org/content/last-stand-in-space
Music by yd https://opengameart.org/content/another-space-background-track
